parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO prioai_task (
  title, description, source, source_ref, requester, role_hint, due_at,
  est_minutes, value_score, risk_score, role_score, haste_score,
  ai_score, ai_reason, status
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.task_title.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.task_description.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.source }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.source_ref }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.sender }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.role_hint || '' }}',
  {{ $json.due_date ? "'" + $json.due_date + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.estimated_minutes || $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.est_minutes || 'NULL' }},
  {{ Math.round($json.priority_score * 0.30) }},
  {{ Math.round($json.priority_score * 0.25) }},
  {{ Math.round($json.priority_score * 0.15) }},
  {{ Math.round($json.priority_score * 0.30) }},
  {{ $json.priority_score }},
  '{{ $json.priority_reasoning.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  'incoming'
)
RETURNING id, title, ai_score, due_at, source;
